Get a country shapefile from GeoBoundaries API

Source: R/get_country_shp.R
get_country_shp.Rd

This function retrieves a shapefile for the given iso3 code from the GeoBoundaries data API.

Usage

get_country_shp(iso3, path_output = NULL)

Arguments

iso3

A three-letter capitalized character string. Must follow the ISO-3166 Alpha-3 country code standard (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3).

path_output

A file path of where to save the country shapefile

Value

sf class shapefile

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{

tmp <- get_country_shp(iso3 = 'MCO')
plot(tmp)

} # }
